{{Infobox Berry |name = #48 Kasib |image = [[File:Kasib.png]] |caption = Considered to have a special power from the olden days, this Berry is sometimes dried and used as a good-luck charm. Nearby Pok√©mon are wary of this Berry plant. |growtime = 5m 0s |harvest = 1 berry |replant = 100% |points = 25 |flavor =
*0 spicy *10 dry *20 sweet *0 bitter *0 sour }} == Description == '''Kasib''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by letting any berry wither after unlocking [[Occa]] or any later berry. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 30 secs || 1 min || 2 mins || 5 mins - 1 day |- ! Animation | [[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] || [[File:KasibTreeTaller.png|50px]] || [[File:KasibTreeBloom.png|50px]] || [[File:KasibTreeBerry.png|50px]] |- ! Effect |
colspan=4|Causes all ripe berries to wither 5x as fast |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable collapsible" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 5 mins -
23 hours 55 mins || --- |- ! Mulch/Sprayduck | 3 mins 20 secs -
15 hours 56 mins 40 secs || 1 mulch |- ! Mulch*Sprayduck | 2 mins 13 secs -
10 hours 37 mins 47 secs || 1 mulch |} == Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Kasib berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 50px;" | [[File:Cheri.png|30px]]
